C M R T 

T

terminate() - Method in class cancellation.Thread1
terminates this thread and sends a poison pill to the next thread via the message queue
terminate() - Method in class cancellation.Thread3
terminate thread 3
Thread1 - Class in cancellation
Thread1 creates numbers between 0-41 and sends this values via the message queue to another thread.
Thread1(ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Integer>) - Constructor for class cancellation.Thread1
 
Thread2 - Class in cancellation
Thread2 takes the values from receiving message queue and sends only the even numbers to the next thread with the sending message queue.
Thread2(ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Integer>, ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Integer>) - Constructor for class cancellation.Thread2
 
Thread3 - Class in cancellation
Thread3 takes the values from a message queue and sends all values through a socket to an receiving thread.
Thread3(ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Integer>) - Constructor for class cancellation.Thread3
 
Thread4 - Class in cancellation
Thread4 takes the values from a server socket and print then the values to the console.
Thread4(ServerSocket) - Constructor for class cancellation.Thread4
